markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Parchment of Secrets](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1625)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 82</row>

**Price** 8 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Member of a secret society

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This parchment is crafted with illusion magic, allowing for the transfer of secret messages. You can fill the parchment with the usual amount of text, encoding your secret message within the innocuous message.

<document level="2" id="action-1239" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Parchment of Secrets
